content: 10 st 2 half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next 8 st 2 half_double_crochet in next chain 12 skip 10 st and half_double_crochet in last 6 st chain 1 turn 48 5 half_double_crochet in each st and chain across chain 1 turn 48 6 half_double_crochet in next 15 st 2 half_double_crochet in next across chain 1 turn 51 7­8 half_double_crochet in each st across chain 2 turn 51 9 2 double_crochet in each st across chain 2 turn 102 10­20 double_crochet in each st across chain 2 turn 102 do not fasten_off join skirt and work button band chain 1 and slip_stitch skirt closed up the first nine row turn dress right side out and single_crochet up the edge working 2 single_crochet in each double_crochet row end and 1 single_crochet in each half_double_crochet row end single_crochet in each chain of neckline single_crochet down other edge chain 1 and turn single_crochet in first st *chain 2 skip 2 st single_crochet in next 3 st* twice single_crochet in 2 st chain 1 turn single_crochet in each single_crochet and work 2 single_crochet in each chain space fasten_off skirt edging 1 join white yarn at the hem of skirt right side facing chain 1 single_crochet in each st around join in first st 102 2 chain 2 2 double_crochet in same st *chain 1 skip next st double_crochet in next 3 st* around to last st chain 1 skip last st double_crochet in joining slip_stitch join in first st 102 3 chain 1 single_crochet in same st *4 double_crochet in chain space skip next double_crochet single_crochet in next double_crochet* around join in first st fasten_off sleeves make 2 1 join yarn in first st of underarm chain 1 half_double_crochet in each st of underarm half_double_crochet in row end 2 double_crochet in next 10 st half_double_crochet in row end join in first st 34 2­4 chain 2 does not count as st double_crochet in same st and each st around join in first st 34 5 chain 1 half_double_crochet in 13 st decrease ten times half_double_crochet in last st join in first st 24 6 chain 1 single_crochet in same st and each st around join in first st fasten_off collar chain 31 1a single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in next 14 chain chain 1 turn 2a decrease single_crochet in next 11 st decrease chain 1 turn 3a decrease single_crochet in next 9 st decrease slip_stitch down to chain 1b single_crochet in last 15 chain chain 1 turn 2b decrease single_crochet in next 11 st decrease chain 1 turn 3b decrease single_crochet in next 9 st decrease chain 1 slip_stitch back to starting chain position collar onto neckline of dress slip_stitch collar onto neckline right sides both facing you fasten_off if you like you can make pockets for the dress as well i did mine with 4 row of 8 double_crochet and one row of white single_crochet bloomers note chain 2 does not count as a st chain 50 1 double_crochet in third
